tool_description: Validates kitchen room measurements and identifies potential spatial constraints for design planning.
error_messages: Invalid dimensions: Room dimensions must be positive numbers greater than 4 feet.
Ceiling height too low: Minimum ceiling height must be 7 feet for kitchen design.
Room too small: Kitchen requires minimum 70 square feet of floor space.
usage: Input room measurements to validate spatial feasibility for kitchen design. Tool checks minimum size requirements and identifies constraints.

is_valid.description: Whether dimensions meet kitchen design standards

total_area.description: Total floor area in square feet

constraints.description: List of spatial limitations or concerns
